attributes.action: Change the rate of pay depending on age groups
attributes.background: I have seen rate of pay charts showing workers hourly rates and they differ on age when people are doing the same job if not more than the older generation who are getting paid more.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

There are different rates for National Minimum Wage and National Living Wage depending on how old someone is. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/national-minimum-wage-rates

You could ask for the legal minimum wage to be the same for everyone, regardless of age, if that's what you'd like to happen.
